articles.author: Max Goldbart
articles.title: Mushroom Killer Erin Patterson Found Guilty After Trial In Australia - Deadline
articles.description: Mushroom killer Erin Patterson has been found guilty after a trial with sentencing coming later - she had poisoned relatives with beef wellington.
articles.content:
Erin Patterson has been found guilty of murdering three relatives with poisonous mushrooms following a trial that has gripped the world. 
The Australian woman, aged 50, was found guilty of these thr… [+1319 chars]
